title: Isekai Cheat Magician
synopsis: Regular high schooler Taichi Nishimura and his childhood friend, Rin Azuma, are on their way to school one ordinary morning. Suddenly, a glowing light envelops them, transporting them to a fantasy world full of magical creatures.
related_anime: ['Isekai Cheat Magician: Yoiboshi no Matsuri to Majutsushi', 'Isekai Cheat Magician']
